bibl.title: The Excavation in the Monastery of Apa Shenute at Suhag. With an Appendix on Documentary Photography at the Monasteries of Anba Shinuda and Anba Bishoi, Suhag, by Elizabeth S. BOLMAN.
bibl.note: Excavation of the Egyptian Supreme Council of Antiquities. Preliminary report of the site of the "White Monastery" after three seasons of work (1989, 1990, 2002). - The General Layout of the Monastery. - The Peristyle Building. - The Complex with the Cruciform Pillars and Toilets. - The Large Building: A Residence Hall or a Granary? - A Second Residence Hall. - The Well with the Eastern Court. - The Four-Pillar Building and the Neighboring Structures to the South. - Conclusion. - Pp. 381-382: Appendix. Documentary Photography at the Monasteries of Anba Shinuda and Anba Bishoi, Suhag (by Elizabeth S. BOLMAN).
bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter, Darlene BROOKS-HEDSTROM and Mohamed ABDAL-RASSUL, The Excavation in the Monastery of Apa Shenute (Dayr Anba Shinuda) at Suhag. With an Appendix on Documentary Photography at the Monasteries of Anba Shinuda and Anba Bishoi, Suhag, by Elizabeth S. BOLMAN.

Excavation of the Egyptian Supreme Council of Antiquities. Preliminary report of the site of the "White Monastery" after three seasons of work (1989, 1990, 2002). - The General Layout of the Monastery. - The Peristyle Building. - The Complex with the Cruciform Pillars and Toilets. - The Large Building: A Residence Hall or a Granary? - A Second Residence Hall. - The Well with the Eastern Court. - The Four-Pillar Building and the Neighboring Structures to the South. - Conclusion. - Pp. 381-382: Appendix. Documentary Photography at the Monasteries of Anba Shinuda and Anba Bishoi, Suhag (by Elizabeth S. BOLMAN).
